chats.question: Add Key Type
chats.answer:
1. In keyboardTypes add new KEY_ to const, KeyboardKey, KeyboardKeys  
```plaintext  
|-- engine_api
|   |-- src
|       |-- ecs
|           |-- keyboard
|               |-- keyboardTypes.ts
```
2. Export Key const  in z_export->esc_system.ts
```typescript
export {
  KEY_,
  .
  .
  . 
} from '../ecs/system/keyboard/keyboardTypes'
```
3. Run command to propagate it in engine,  ball_game, desktop_ball_game
```bash
npm run i-lib
```

chats.question: Add Key to KeyboardMapping system
chats.answer:
1. Add mapping of key to action, witch is sending event using event System,  method  
initKeyAction.
```plaintext
|-- engine
|   |-- src
|       |-- ecs
|           |-- system
|               |-- keyboard
|                   |-- KeyboardMapping.ts
```
```typescript
[KEY_]: (id) =>
        this._eventSystem.publish(KeyboardEvent, {
          entityId: id,
          key: KEY_,
        } as IKeyboardEventData),
```
